A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Except for the visuals\, the movie failed in its own right\, and also damaged core ideas of Star Wars. New ideas properly executed are good. New ideas executed as poorly as in this movie result in questions about leadership.  With so many capable and creative people out there\, why wasn't there a process for fixing the story? Fixing the dialogue? Fixing the editing? I assume that the ;lack luster score resulting from the poor script and editing.
